Uses of Class
org.thedryden.workmanager.WorkerPool

  • Uses of WorkerPool in org.thedryden.workmanager

    Methods in org.thedryden.workmanager that return WorkerPool 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.addPool​(java.lang.String poolName)
    Adds a pool of threads.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.addPrecedenceConstraint​(java.lang.String precedenceConstraint)
    Adds a precedence constraint to the last worker added.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.addPrecedenceConstraint​(java.lang.String threadName, java.lang.String precedenceConstraint)
    Adds a precedence constraint to the worker with the passed thread name.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.addWorker​(java.lang.String poolName, WorkerInterface newWorker)
    Takes a pool name and adds a single worker to the end of that pools list of workers.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.addWorker​(WorkerInterface newWorker)
    Adds a worker to the end of the pool associated with the last pool added with addPool
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.appendThreadName​(java.lang.String append)
    Used to append a string to the thread name of the previously added worker.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.joinPool​(int waitMilliseconds, java.lang.String poolName)
    Used in conjunction with any of Async methods to block execution until the passed poolName completes or waitMilliseconds elapses.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.joinPools​(int waitMilliseconds, java.lang.String... poolNames)
    Used in conjunction with any of Async methods to block execution until the passed poolNames completes or waitMilliseconds elapses.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.prependThreadName​(java.lang.String prepend)
    Used to prepend a string to the thread name of the previously added worker.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setExitOnError​(boolean exitOnError)
    Used to set exitOnError.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setMaxThreadCount​(int maxThreadCount)
    Sets the maximum number of threads that can be run at once.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setNoNewThreadsOnFailure​(boolean noNewThreadsOnFailure)
    If set to true then if any threads fail in a pool, no more workers in that pool will be started.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setNotInAll()
    Sets the last worker added with either the addWorker method to the Not In All list.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setNotInAll​(java.lang.String workerThreadName)
    Takes a worker's thread name and adds it to the Not In All list.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setPools​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> poolNames)
    Allows you to pass a list of the name of all the thread pools you want to create.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setPrecedenceConstraint​(java.lang.String threadName, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> precedenceConstraint)
    Allows you to set the entire precedence constraint of the worker with the passed thread name.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setPrecedenceConstraint​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> precedenceConstraint)
    Allows you to set the entire precedence constraint of the previously added worker.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setRetry​(int retryAttempts, int retryWaitSeconds, boolean rerunSuccess)
    For the last pool added sets a number of retry to attempt on a failure and the number of seconds to wait before after a failure before the retry.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setRetry​(java.lang.String poolName, int retryAttempts, int retryWaitSeconds, boolean rerunSuccess)
    For the passed poolName added sets a number of retry to attempt on a failure and the number of seconds to wait before after a failure before the retry.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setRunArg​(java.lang.String[] runArg)
    Used to control which pools / workers will run.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setRunArg​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> runArg)
    Used to control which pools / workers will run.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setSecondsBetweenMsg​(long timeBetweenMsg)
    Sets the number of seconds between sending status messages.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setStartNextPoolOnFailure​(boolean startNextPoolOnFailure)
    Used to set the value for the property: start next pool on failure.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setThreadName​(java.lang.String threadName)
    Used to overwrite the thread name of the previously added worker.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setWorkerRetry​(int retryAttempts, int retryWaitSeconds)
    For the last worker added sets a number of retry to attempt on a failure and the number of seconds to wait before after a failure before the retry.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setWorkerRetry​(java.lang.String threadName, int retryAttempts, int retryWaitSeconds)
    For the passed worker added sets a number of retry to attempt on a failure and the number of seconds to wait before after a failure before the retry.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setWorkers​(java.lang.String poolName, java.util.List<WorkerInterface> workers)
    Takes a pool name and a list of worker objects and sets / replaces the entire list of workers associated within that pool
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.setWorkers​(java.util.List<WorkerInterface> workers)
    Takes a list of worker objects and sets / replaces the entire list of workers associated with the last pool added with addPool
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.start()
    Starts all pools in the order they were added.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startAsync()
    Starts all pools at the same time asynchronously.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startAsyncAndJoin()
    Starts all pools at the same time asynchronously and then blocks execution until they complete.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startOnePool​(java.lang.String poolName)
    Starts the passed pool.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startOnePoolAsync​(java.lang.String poolName)
    Starts the passed pool, without blocking until completion.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startPools​(java.lang.String... poolNames)
    Starts the passed pools, running them one at a time in the order they were passed - not added.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startPoolsAsync​(java.lang.String... poolNames)
    Starts the passed pools, without blocking until completion.
    WorkerPool WorkerPool.startPoolsAsyncAndJoin​(java.lang.String... poolNames)
    Used to start multiple pool asynchronous, but then wait for all pools to complete before continuing.
